mapper.select: SELECT name, mac, description FROM activity_device;

SELECT b.name, b.mac, b.description, a.userId, a.name as userName, a.SCHOOL_YEAR AS schoolYear, a.School_ID AS schoolId, a.Grade_ID AS schoolGradeId, a.class AS classNumber FROM (SELECT a.name, a.mac, description, b.student_id FROM activity_device a, activity_device_student_map b WHERE a.name = b.device_name) b LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM student_info_detail a WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.school_year = #{year} AND a.school_id = #{school_id} AND a.grade_id = #{grade_id} AND a.class = #{class_id}) a ON a.userId = b.student_id ;
mapper.insert: insert into activity_registration (student_id, mac, reg_datetime, sports_id, collect_datetime, steps, calorie, distance) values(#{userId}, #{mac}, now(), #{sportId}, #{collectDt}, #{steps}, #{calorie}, #{distance});
